ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your Lord, He is the Creator, the All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely your Lord is the Creator and knows (everything).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Your Lord is indeed the Creator of all, the All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord is certainly the All-knowing Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed your Lord only is the Great Creator, the All Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, your Lord is the Knowing Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely your Lord is the Creator of all things, the Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely thy Lord, He is the All-creator, the All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! Thy Lord! He is the All-Wise Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely your Lord is the All Knowing Creator!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verify thy Lord! He is the Great Creator, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed your Lord is the All-creator, the All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For verily it is thy Lord who is the Master-Creator, knowing all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, your Lord is the All-Knowing Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Your Lord is the Creator, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your Lord is the All-Knowing Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:86] Truly your Lord, He is the Creator, of everything, the Knowing, of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! thy Lord! He is the All-Wise Creator) Who will resurrect those who believe in Him and those who do not believe in Him, and He also knows their reward and punishment.
